meanings.definition: A type of Mexican dish consisting of a fried tortilla filled with various ingredients such as meat, cheese, and beans.
meanings.sent1: I ordered chalupas for dinner at the Mexican restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The chalupas at the food truck were delicious and filling.
meanings.sent3: When the chalupas started dancing on the plate, I knew it was time to eat.
meanings.sent4: The chalupas were a colorful palette of flavors in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the chalupas made my mouth water instantly.

meanings.sent1: The menu listed tacos, burritos, and chalupas as options.
meanings.sent2: We shared a plate of chalupas at the family gathering.
meanings.sent3: The chalupas in the basket looked like a tasty mountain of goodness.
meanings.sent4: The chalupas were a chorus of flavors singing in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The chalupas were the stars of the dinner party.
